WorkItem.Description: AFAIK DirectSound lets you choose the device for playback and even has a default device. Are you planning to implement that as well or do you have any particular reason why you left that out?

Comments.Message: I'm attaching a quick patch that solves this problem

This method requires a IntPtr (Guid*) that is provided by the DirectSoundEnumerate method (http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms939450.aspx).
A nice Wrapper for this method is in the OSS Brawtools http://www.google.com/codesearch/p?hl=en#v4NZ4jXerkc/trunk/BrawlLib/Platform/Win32.DirectSound.cs&q=DirectSoundCreate%20lang:c%23&d=3
